name: Wild Elephant Simulator 3D
description:
Enter into the wild savanna and try yourself as Elephant in the most advanced Elephant simulator game you have ever seen! Survive in the wilderness as long as you can, fight against other animals, become very powerful!

Maintain your health and energy by eating and drinking water, explore a massive world, fight other animals to become more powerful.

Features:
- Realistic elephant simulator
- Fight against lots of animals
- Various attacking features

Survive against the elements for as long as you can in the high action wild animal simulator. The secret to the game is survival.
